title: Caroline Flack looks gloomy in London after explosive row with boyfriend Lewis

Caroline Flack looked down in the dumps as she stepped out in London on Tuesday, days after a blazing row with her boyfriend Lewis Burton in Ibiza.

The Love Island host, 39, didn't seem too pleased as she trudged the streets of Hampstead after admitting her holiday was not as relaxing as she had planned.

In an Instagram post, she wrote: "Back from holiday...

"Not quite as relaxing as I thought but ready to jump back into work! NEWWWWW JOB THIS WEEK... all to be revealed soon."

She was dressed in a warm parka coat with a furry lining, paired with chunky leather boots and a denim skirt, finishing the look off with a pair of dark shades.

The presenter's relationship seemed to be on the rocks when she had an explosive row with Lewis as they sat on board a luxury boat together last week.

(Image: ZJ / BACKGRID)

(Image: ZJ / BACKGRID)

They engaged in a tense discussion during a day out at sea with a group of friends.

Caroline was seen turning away with her arms crossed and looked close to tears as she spoke to her toy boy lover.

She was even seen holding her phone up to his face so he could read the screen.

(Image: ZJ / BACKGRID)

However, they put their troubles behind them as they shared a romantic kiss following a lunch date in Ibiza on the Friday.

It has been a full-on summer for the television sensation as she was away in Mallorca filming scenes for Love Island.

Caroline has been able to focus on her love life before she gets back to work on the new winter series of Love Island which is launching in January.
